00029 #ifndef _Rectangle_H__
00030 #define _Rectangle_H__
00031 
00032 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00036     struct _OgreExport Rectangle
00037     {
00038         Real left;
00039         Real top;
00040         Real right;
00041         Real bottom;
00042 
00043         inline bool inside(Real x, Real y) const { return x >= left && x <= right && y >= top && y <= bottom; }
00044     };
00045 
00055     inline Rectangle intersect(const Rectangle& lhs, const Rectangle& rhs)
00056     {
00057         Rectangle r;
00058 
00059         r.left   = lhs.left   > rhs.left   ? lhs.left   : rhs.left;
00060         r.top    = lhs.top    > rhs.top    ? lhs.top    : rhs.top;
00061         r.right  = lhs.right  < rhs.right  ? lhs.right  : rhs.right;
00062         r.bottom = lhs.bottom < rhs.bottom ? lhs.bottom : rhs.bottom;
00063 
00064         return r;
00065     }
00066 
00067 }
00068 
00069 #endif // _Rectangle_H__
